exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Classic cardio warm-up that elevates heart rate
exercises.instructions: Stand tall with feet together, arms at sides. Jump feet wide while raising arms overhead. Jump back to start. Keep a steady rhythm.

modifications.easier: Step side to side instead of jumping (step jacks)
modifications.harder: Add a squat between each jack

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Push hips back and bend knees to lower down. Keep chest up and weight in heels. Drive through heels to stand.

modifications.easier: Squat to a chair or reduce depth
modifications.harder: Add a pause at the bottom or pulse

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position, hands slightly wider than shoulders. Lower chest towards floor, keeping body straight. Push back up to start.

modifications.easier: Knees on floor, or push against a wall
modifications.harder: Elevate feet, or add a clap

exercises.name: Reverse Lunge
exercises.instructions: Stand tall. Step one foot back and lower until both knees are at 90 degrees. Front knee stays over ankle. Push through front heel to return.

modifications.easier: Hold onto a wall for balance, reduce range
modifications.harder: Add a jump to switch legs

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Forearms on floor, elbows under shoulders. Body in straight line from head to heels. Engage core, don't let hips sag or pike up. Breathe steadily.

modifications.easier: Knees on floor, or hold for shorter time
modifications.harder: Lift one arm or leg, or add shoulder taps

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Start in push-up position. Drive one knee towards chest, then quickly switch legs. Keep hips low and core tight. Move as fast as form allows.

modifications.easier: Slow the pace, step instead of jump

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on floor. Push through heels to lift hips until body forms straight line. Squeeze glutes at top. Lower with control.

modifications.harder: Single leg, or add a pause at top

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, arms reaching to ceiling, knees bent at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg towards floor while keeping lower back pressed down. Return and switch sides.

modifications.easier: Move only legs, keep arms still
modifications.harder: Slow down the movement, or add ankle weights

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Extend opposite arm and leg until parallel to floor. Keep hips level and core engaged. Return with control, switch sides.

modifications.easier: Extend only arm or only leg
modifications.harder: Add a pause, or draw circles with extended limbs

exercises.videoSearch: bird dog exercise proper form mcgill

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Lean back against wall, slide down until thighs are parallel to floor. Knees at 90 degrees, directly over ankles. Hold position, breathe steadily.

modifications.easier: Don't go as deep, or hold for shorter time
modifications.harder: Single leg, or hold a weight

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.instructions: From standing, squat down and place hands on floor. Jump feet back to plank. Do a push-up. Jump feet forward. Explode up with a jump and arms overhead.

modifications.easier: Step back instead of jump, remove push-up, step up instead of jump
modifications.harder: Add a tuck jump at the top

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, arms extended overhead. Simultaneously lift arms, chest, and legs off the floor. Squeeze glutes and back muscles. Hold briefly, lower with control.

modifications.easier: Lift only arms OR only legs

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.instructions: Run in place, driving knees up towards chest. Pump arms in running motion. Stay on balls of feet. Keep core engaged and maintain tall posture.

modifications.easier: March instead of run, lower knee height
modifications.harder: Increase speed, or add arm drivers

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.instructions: Sit on edge of chair/bench, hands gripping edge. Slide off, supporting weight on hands. Lower body by bending elbows to 90 degrees. Push back up.

modifications.easier: Keep feet closer, bend knees more
modifications.harder: Extend legs straight, or elevate feet

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on side, elbow under shoulder. Lift hips so body forms straight line. Top arm can reach to ceiling or rest on hip. Hold, then switch sides.

modifications.easier: Bottom knee on floor for support
modifications.harder: Lift top leg, or add hip dips
